info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 7:30PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Phillips, northeastern Garfield, Daniels, Roosevelt, central Valley, northern McCone and northwestern Richland Counties through 830 PM MDT... At 729 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 18 miles west of Opheim to 11 miles west of Vida. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Glasgow, Wolf Point, Scobey, Poplar, Opheim, Richland, Nashua, Brockton, Fort Peck, St. Marie, Peerless, Lustre, Bredette, Frazer, Port Of Opheim, Park Grove, Four Buttes, West Fork, Volt, and Frenchman Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
